content.text: Hi! It's been going great! I just got back from a hike and I'm really happy with how far I've gotten in my training.
That's awesome! I'm trying to get back into hiking more often myself.
You should! It's such a great way to get outside and enjoy nature.
I know, I miss it. I've been having trouble finding the time though.
I get that. It can be hard to fit everything in.
Do you have a favorite place to hike?
I love hiking in the mountains! I'm from California, so I'm lucky to have a lot of great hiking trails nearby.
I love the mountains too! I'm from New York, but I've been to California a few times and I always love hiking there.
What are some of your favorite hikes in California?
I love hiking in Yosemite! And I also really like hiking in the Sierra Nevada mountains.
I've always wanted to go to Yosemite! It looks so beautiful.
It is! You should definitely go sometime.
I will! I'm sure I'll love it.
